title: 20's looking font
content:
Greetings all,

Any body seen a font that looks similar to this? I know I've seen a few 20's looking fonts in the same vein as this, but haven't traced it down as of yet. Even something close will let me redraw it easier.

Thanks much,

Mark Kerley@Lucky Rabbit Studio

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [wp3anly6 copy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120113110545/http:/typophile.com/files/wp3anly6%20copy.jpg) | 245.72 KB |
author: mkerley

comments.content: It's Broadway. The black lines are superimposed and not part of the font.
